purpose: React component library for customizable toast notifications using Radix UI primitives with styling variants

variables.name: ToastProvider
variables.usage: Wraps the app to enable toast functionality

variables.name: ToastViewport
variables.purpose: Container that positions and displays all active toasts
variables.usage: Renders fixed positioned container for toast notifications with responsive positioning

variables.name: toastVariants
variables.purpose: Defines styling variants for toast components
variables.usage: CVA configuration for default and destructive toast styles with animations

variables.name: Toast
variables.usage: Displays individual toast messages with variant styling

variables.name: ToastAction
variables.usage: Renders clickable actions within toast notifications

variables.name: ToastClose
variables.usage: X button that appears on hover to close toast notifications

variables.name: ToastTitle
variables.usage: Displays the main heading of a toast notification

variables.name: ToastDescription
variables.usage: Displays secondary text content in toast notifications

key_points: Implements a complete toast notification system with multiple components
Uses Radix UI's headless toast primitives for accessibility
Provides styled components with variants using class-variance-authority
All components use React.forwardRef for proper ref forwarding
Includes viewport positioning, animations, and swipe gestures support

patterns: Component composition pattern with multiple exported sub-components
forwardRef pattern for all components to support ref forwarding
Headless UI pattern using Radix UI primitives
Variant pattern using CVA for consistent styling
BEM-like naming convention for component display names
issues: The 'toast-close' attribute on ToastClose has an empty string value which might be unintentional
Complex animation classes in toastVariants might be hard to maintain
No error boundary or fallback handling for toast failures
TypeScript types are exported but not all components have explicit prop type definitions
